20110108030043.000|20110108030044.000|CC1|THEM BUT I GUESS THIS IS BETTER 
20110108030044.000|20110108030045.000|CC1|THAN NOTHING.

20110108030047.000|20110108030048.000|CC1|UP IN A CAR AFTER I HAD SHOT

20110108030103.000|20110108030104.000|CC1|WAS IN JAIL FOR HAVING TAKEN

20110108030127.000|20110108030128.000|CC1|>>> THE OLDEST MAXIMUM SECURITY 
20110108030128.000|20110108030131.000|CC1|FACILITY IN THE STATE OF INDIANA
20110108030131.000|20110108030132.000|CC1|IS THE INDIANA STATE PRISON,    
20110108030132.000|20110108030132.000|CC1|LOCATED NEAR THE SHORES OF LAKE 
20110108030132.000|20110108030135.000|CC1|MICHIGAN.                       
20110108030135.000|20110108030136.000|CC1|FOR YEARS ISP, AS IT'S KNOWN,   
20110108030136.000|20110108030137.000|CC1|HAD A REPUTATION AS ONE OF THE  
20110108030137.000|20110108030139.000|CC1|TOUGHEST IN THE STATE.          
20110108030139.000|20110108030141.000|CC1|BUT AS YOU'RE ABOUT TO SEE IN   
20110108030141.000|20110108030142.000|CC1|THE NEXT HOUR, NEW POLICIES AND 
20110108030142.000|20110108030144.000|CC1|PHILOSOPHIES ARE TRYING TO MAKE 
20110108030144.000|20110108030145.000|CC1|THIS A PLACE WHERE HISTORY WON'T
20110108030145.000|20110108030150.000|CC1|REPEAT ITSELF.                  
20110108030150.000|20110108030152.000|CC1|FORTRESSED BEHIND A 40-FOOT-HIGH
20110108030152.000|20110108030155.000|CC1|WALL THAT STRETCHES A MILE LONG 
20110108030155.000|20110108030156.000|CC1|IS A HIGHLY SECURE CITY KNOWN AS
20110108030156.000|20110108030158.000|CC1|INDIANA STATE PRISON.           
20110108030158.000|20110108030200.000|CC1|ORIGINALLY BUILT TO HOLD        
20110108030200.000|20110108030202.000|CC1|PRISONERS DURING THE CIVIL WAR, 
20110108030202.000|20110108030204.000|CC1|ISP HAS A HISTORY OF HOUSING    
20110108030204.000|20110108030205.000|CC1|SOME OF THE STATE'S MOST SERIOUS
20110108030205.000|20110108030211.000|CC1|CRIMINALS.                      
20110108030211.000|20110108030211.000|CC1|NEARLY 2,000 MAXIMUM SECURITY   
20110108030211.000|20110108030212.000|CC1|INMATES SPEND THEIR DAYS BEHIND 
20110108030212.000|20110108030214.000|CC1|THESE CENTURY OLD WALLS.        
20110108030214.000|20110108030214.000|CC1|>> THE NUMBER ONE CHARGE AT THIS
20110108030214.000|20110108030216.000|CC1|FACILITY IS MURDER.             
20110108030216.000|20110108030217.000|CC1|APPROXIMATELY 70% OF THE        
20110108030217.000|20110108030219.000|CC1|OFFENDERS HOUSED HERE ARE HOUSED
20110108030219.000|20110108030220.000|CC1|HERE FOR TAKING THE LIFE OF     
20110108030220.000|20110108030224.000|CC1|ANOTHER HUMAN BEING.            
20110108030224.000|20110108030225.000|CC1|>> WHILE THE MAJORITY OF        
20110108030225.000|20110108030226.000|CC1|PRISONERS HAVE COMMITTED VIOLENT
20110108030226.000|20110108030228.000|CC1|CRIMES, THE PRISON HAS WORKED   
20110108030228.000|20110108030229.000|CC1|HARD TO CREATE A SAFE           
20110108030229.000|20110108030230.000|CC1|ENVIRONMENT FOR BOTH STAFF AND  
20110108030230.000|20110108030232.000|CC1|INMATES.                        
20110108030232.000|20110108030234.000|CC1|ONE IMPROVEMENT WAS THE         
20110108030234.000|20110108030234.000|CC1|ADMINISTRATIVE SEGREGATION UNIT.
20110108030234.000|20110108030238.000|CC1|>> BACK IN THE EARLY '90s WE HAD
20110108030238.000|20110108030240.000|CC1|PROBLEMS THROUGHOUT THE WHOLE   
20110108030240.000|20110108030241.000|CC1|INSTITUTION WHERE WE HAD        
20110108030241.000|20110108030242.000|CC1|VIOLENCE EVERY PLACE.           
20110108030242.000|20110108030243.000|CC1|WE HAD ASSAULTS, FIGHTS,        
20110108030243.000|20110108030245.000|CC1|STABBINGS, ALL THE DIFFERENT    
20110108030245.000|20110108030246.000|CC1|STUFF THAT GOES ALONG WITH THAT.
20110108030246.000|20110108030248.000|CC1|AND WHAT WE DID, WE CAME UP WITH
20110108030248.000|20110108030253.000|CC1|ADMINISTRATIVE SEGREGATION UNIT 
20110108030253.000|20110108030255.000|CC1|AND ISOLATED THE ONES THAT WAS  
20110108030255.000|20110108030256.000|CC1|DOING ALL THIS.                 
20110108030256.000|20110108030257.000|CC1|AND AFTER WE DID THAT, WE PRETTY
20110108030257.000|20110108030257.000|CC1|MUCH STOPPED THE ASSAULTS AND   
20110108030257.000|20110108030258.000|CC1|EVERYTHING ELSE.                
20110108030258.000|20110108030258.000|CC1|WE STILL HAVE ASSAULTS OVER ON  
20110108030258.000|20110108030259.000|CC1|THESE UNITS UP HERE IN OUR      
20110108030259.000|20110108030301.000|CC1|DISCIPLINARY SEGREGATION UNIT   
20110108030301.000|20110108030302.000|CC1|BUT IT'S DOWN ABOUT 85% IN      
20110108030302.000|20110108030305.000|CC1|POPULATION.                     
20110108030305.000|20110108030306.000|CC1|>> THE MEN HOUSED IN AD SEG ARE 
20110108030306.000|20110108030309.000|CC1|ALLOWED ONE HOUR OF RECREATION  
20110108030309.000|20110108030311.000|CC1|PER DAY IN AN ENCLOSED YARD.    
20110108030311.000|20110108030312.000|CC1|THE REST OF THE TIME THEY'RE    
20110108030312.000|20110108030315.000|CC1|CONFINED TO THEIR CELL.         
20110108030315.000|20110108030318.000|CC1|>> THIS IS MY LA-Z-BOY, MY      
20110108030318.000|20110108030320.000|CC1|CHAIR, SITTING IN THE CELL FOR  
20110108030320.000|20110108030322.000|CC1|YEARS AND YEARS AND YEARS.      
20110108030322.000|20110108030324.000|CC1|IT WILL MESS YOUR BACK UP.      
20110108030324.000|20110108030326.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THE STEEL BEDS.      
20110108030326.000|20110108030327.000|CC1|THROUGH THE YEARS PEOPLE JUMP UP
20110108030327.000|20110108030329.000|CC1|AND DOWN ON THEM SO THAT MAKES

20110108030333.000|20110108030334.000|CC1|>> CONVICTED OF MURDER AND

20110108030337.000|20110108030338.000|CC1|JOCCO BAILEY WAS GIVEN A 40-YEAR

20110108030410.000|20110108030414.000|CC1|GUIDANCE ARE DELIVERED TO THE

20110108030417.000|20110108030418.000|CC1|HERE AND I WON'T BOTHER YOU

20110108030434.000|20110108030436.000|CC1|THEM WANT TO TALK TO ME.

20110108030511.000|20110108030514.000|CC1|I STAY IN MY CELL 23 1/2 HOURS A

20110108030519.000|20110108030520.000|CC1|CELLS.                          
20110108030520.000|20110108030523.000|CC1|I NEED ALL THE HELP I CAN GET.  
20110108030523.000|20110108030526.000|CC1|>> ERNIE JOHNSON, SERVING 26    
20110108030526.000|20110108030527.000|CC1|YEARS FOR ROBBERY, WAS SENT TO  
20110108030527.000|20110108030528.000|CC1|AD SEG FOR ASSAULTING ANOTHER   
20110108030528.000|20110108030529.000|CC1|INMATE.                         
20110108030529.000|20110108030532.000|CC1|>> I GOT INTO A FIGHT.          
20110108030532.000|20110108030533.000|CC1|I HAVE A REAL PROBLEM WITH CHILD
20110108030533.000|20110108030535.000|CC1|MOLESTERS AND I DON'T LIKE THEM 
20110108030535.000|20110108030536.000|CC1|AROUND ME.                      
20110108030536.000|20110108030538.000|CC1|I DON'T WANT THEM NEAR ME.      
20110108030538.000|20110108030539.000|CC1|I DON'T EVEN WANT THEM IN THIS  
20110108030539.000|20110108030540.000|CC1|PRISON.                         
20110108030540.000|20110108030541.000|CC1|AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED, THEY   
20110108030541.000|20110108030543.000|CC1|CAN DIE.                        
20110108030543.000|20110108030544.000|CC1|AND WHEN THEY GET AROUND ME AND 
20110108030544.000|20110108030547.000|CC1|THEY START TALKING AND THEY     
20110108030547.000|20110108030548.000|CC1|THINK IT'S OKAY TO REVEAL THAT  
20110108030548.000|20110108030549.000|CC1|THEY'RE CHILD MOLESTERS, EVERY  
20110108030549.000|20110108030551.000|CC1|TIME THEY SAY THAT, I'M GOING TO
20110108030551.000|20110108030553.000|CC1|SMASH THEM.                     
20110108030553.000|20110108030555.000|CC1|>> SEG GATES.                   
20110108030555.000|20110108030557.000|CC1|>> BEFORE AN INMATE IS SENT TO  
20110108030557.000|20110108030600.000|CC1|AD SEG, HE MUST FIRST SERVE TIME
20110108030600.000|20110108030602.000|CC1|IN THE I-DETENTION UNIT OR IDU. 
20110108030602.000|20110108030603.000|CC1|IN THIS HIGHLY SECURE CELLBLOCK 
20110108030603.000|20110108030604.000|CC1|OFFENDERS HAVE EVEN FEWER       
20110108030604.000|20110108030606.000|CC1|PRIVILEGES AND ALMOST NO CONTACT
20110108030606.000|20110108030609.000|CC1|WITH EACH OTHER.                
20110108030609.000|20110108030610.000|CC1|>> KIND OF LIKE THE PRISONER    
20110108030610.000|20110108030611.000|CC1|JAIL INSIDE THE PRISON.         
20110108030611.000|20110108030612.000|CC1|THEY'RE NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE HOT 
20110108030612.000|20110108030613.000|CC1|POTS UP HERE OR ANYTHING THEY   
20110108030613.000|20110108030615.000|CC1|CAN COOK WITH.                  
20110108030615.000|20110108030617.000|CC1|THEY HAVE LIMITED PROPERTY      
20110108030617.000|20110108030618.000|CC1|THEY'RE ALLOWED TO HAVE UP HERE.
20110108030618.000|20110108030619.000|CC1|ANYTIME THEY COME OUT OF THEIR  
20110108030619.000|20110108030621.000|CC1|CELL THEY HAVE TO BE RESTRAINED 
20110108030621.000|20110108030622.000|CC1|BEHIND THEIR BACK WITH AN       
20110108030622.000|20110108030623.000|CC1|ESCORT.                         
20110108030623.000|20110108030625.000|CC1|THE OFFENDERS THAT ARE UP HERE  
20110108030625.000|20110108030626.000|CC1|ARE THE MOST VIOLENT OFFENDERS  
20110108030626.000|20110108030627.000|CC1|IN THE PRISON SO AT ANY TIME, I 
20110108030627.000|20110108030629.000|CC1|MEAN, THEY MIGHT TRY TO REACH   
20110108030629.000|20110108030630.000|CC1|OUT AND STAB YOU THROUGH THE    
20110108030630.000|20110108030631.000|CC1|BARS.                           
20110108030631.000|20110108030632.000|CC1|IF YOU'RE ON THE CATWALK, IF    
20110108030632.000|20110108030633.000|CC1|THEY HAVE A HOMEMADE WEAPON THEY
20110108030633.000|20110108030635.000|CC1|CAN TRY TO STAB YOU THAT WAY.   
20110108030635.000|20110108030637.000|CC1|AN OFFENDER WHO IS GOOD CAN SLIP
20110108030637.000|20110108030638.000|CC1|THE HANDCUFFS IF YOU'RE NOT     
20110108030638.000|20110108030639.000|CC1|CAREFUL AND ASSAULT YOU THAT    
20110108030639.000|20110108030641.000|CC1|WAY.                            
20110108030641.000|20110108030643.000|CC1|>> NICHOLAS CORBIN WAS SENTENCED
20110108030643.000|20110108030645.000|CC1|TO ONE YEAR IN IDU, THE MAXIMUM 
20110108030645.000|20110108030649.000|CC1|AMOUNT OF TIME.                 
20110108030649.000|20110108030650.000|CC1|A FIGHT WENT DOWN IN MY CELL    
20110108030650.000|20110108030650.000|CC1|HOUSE AND I WAS ACCUSED OF BEING
20110108030650.000|20110108030653.000|CC1|INVOLVED WITH IT.               
20110108030653.000|20110108030654.000|CC1|THE INDIVIDUAL NEEDED TO BE     
20110108030654.000|20110108030655.000|CC1|TAKEN TO AN OUTSIDE HOSPITAL AND
20110108030655.000|20110108030656.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THAT, I WAS SENT UP  
20110108030656.000|20110108030702.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110108030702.000|20110108030702.000|CC1|I'M NOT DISAPPOINTED IN ANYTHING
20110108030702.000|20110108030703.000|CC1|I'VE DONE.                      
20110108030703.000|20110108030704.000|CC1|I'VE MADE THE DECISIONS THAT    
20110108030704.000|20110108030705.000|CC1|I'VE MADE, YOU KNOW, WE'RE CAGED
20110108030705.000|20110108030711.000|CC1|LIKE ANIMALS FOR 23 HOURS A DAY.
20110108030711.000|20110108030712.000|CC1|WE'RE GIVEN FOOD THAT'S OF POOR 
20110108030712.000|20110108030713.000|CC1|QUALITY.                        
20110108030713.000|20110108030714.000|CC1|THERE ISN'T ENOUGH OF IT TO KEEP
20110108030714.000|20110108030715.000|CC1|US FULL IN BETWEEN MEALS.       
20110108030715.000|20110108030715.000|CC1|AND THAT'S JUST HOW WE LIVE OUR 
20110108030715.000|20110108030718.000|CC1|LIVES.                          
20110108030718.000|20110108030735.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110108030718.000|20110108030720.000|CC1|>>> UP NEXT --                  
20110108030720.000|20110108030721.000|CC1|>> MY LIFE ALMOST ENDED RIGHT   
20110108030721.000|20110108030723.000|CC1|UPSTAIRS.

20110108033629.000|20110108033630.000|CC1|HERE I SIT.

20110108033631.000|20110108033632.000|CC1|TO DEAL WITH IT AT ALL.

20110108033655.000|20110108033656.000|CC1|OFFENDER WILL BE SEEN BY MEDICAL

20110108035941.000|20110108035944.000|CC1|BEEN REDUCED BY 50%.
